HouseTypes.title: The Town House
HouseTypes.details: The Town House is a very popular form of housing in Denmark.This is a well executed one and a half or two stories housing type, inspired by classic Danish housing architecture.

HouseTypes.title: The Compact House
HouseTypes.details: Rectangular in shape, the Compact House has very beautiful features. The geometry of this kind of housing is very cost-effective, stylish and structural.

HouseTypes.title: The Angle House
HouseTypes.details: The Angle House is a great choice for people who love to separate personal and social space. The bedrooms and living areas can be divided and yard space can be created in this housing type.

HouseTypes.title: The Funkis House
HouseTypes.details: The Funkis House is quite similar in layout to the classic Nepalese homes. It has a flat roof and normally built in double stories.

Process.title: Affordable
Process.details: A cost-effective and digital building system developed for high precision and rapid assembly. Keep track of building costs with the buildr plug-in software.

Process.title: Renewable
Process.details: Building pods are constructed from only renewable resources. Choose from wood or straw fiber boards and store huge amounts of carbon in your house.

Process.title: Natural
Process.details: Natural materials has great insulation properties and emit no hazardous chemicals. This provides a fresh and healthy indoor air climate in your house.

Process.title: Buildable
Process.details: Modular and intelligent building pods are self locating and easy to install. Parts are coded for fast and simple installation with a step-by-step instruction manual.
